value:
Without Fáfnir at my side...
everything feels strange.

I'm from Niðavellir, the realm of
the dvergar—the land of seiðjárn!
This place is nothing in comparison.

I thought you'd be too dull-witted
to be as troubled as you appear...
Tell me of your woes, if you wish.

*ahem*$k$p...Could you point me to the sweets
vendor? You can come along if
you wish.

I beg your pardon! I am maintaining
my Gullinbursti here. It is intricate
machinery! ...H-hey! No touching!

Hmm... Yes, I see. A lowly creature
like yourself... Of course you must
be $Nf's friend.

Don't misunderstand. This strength
is for my brother—ALL for him.
...Have a complaint?

What a waste of time. You realize
this is your fault, I hope.

And you expect something in return
for this, do you? Hmph.

My name is Ótr, brother of King
Fáfnir of Niðavellir. I am nothing
more than that.

I was only a child when the coup
happened. I didn't know what was
happening or what to do...$k$pAll I knew was that I was in danger,
and I needed to leave. So, in the
chaos, I grabbed the baby and ran.$k$pMy only explanation is that I had
occasionally been asked to look
after it.$k$pI heard my mother screaming behind
me, "No! We must kill the child!" But
only a moment later, she was killed...$k$pKilled by the same people they'd
asked me to lead into the castle.$k$pAfterward, war broke out, and
eventually I came to understand
what had happened.$k$pThinking back on it now, I can't say
I should have done anything different.$k$pBut all that is in the past now. It's all
meaningless at this point. There is
only one side to be on: Fáfnir's.$k$pFáfnir is ALL there is.$k$pHmph. And who are you to
disagree, Summoner?
たあっ
Take this!
ぐっ…
Now you've done it...!
You can't hide from me.
Quiet, scum!
Enough, weakling!
For Fáfnir!
No! Fáfnir...
Hmph.
I am Ótr, King Fáfnir's brother.
You would do well to remember that I detest jokes.
If my brother hadn't found me, I wouldn't be here now. He is everything to me.
Reginn should act more like royalty. Remind her, won't you?
I do not find sweets disagreeable, so if you have any, you can always give them to me. Hm.
Brother, don't leave... Don't leave me alone!
How can you tolerate having me around? I'll never understand you.
Very well.
Are you sane?
Leave it to me.
